# Downtown Clawson DDA

> Downtown Clawson Development Authority (DDA) official website. Independent shops, restaurants, and events along Main Street and 14 Mile Road in Clawson, Michigan. Little City, Big Heart.

The DDA funds downtown improvements, coordinates events, and works to keep the business district a great place to open a shop, grab a meal, or spend a Saturday. The downtown district is a compact, walkable area in a 2.1-square-mile city in Oakland County, between Royal Oak, Troy, and Madison Heights.

## Annual Events

- **Clawson Restaurant Week**: March 22-28, 2026. $15-$25 specials at participating restaurants. Passport stamp program with prizes.
- **Saturday Clawson Market**: Six dates from May through August 2026 (May 16, June 13, June 27, July 11, July 25, Aug 15). Corner of S. Main and 14 Mile Rd. 10 AM - 2 PM (July 25 is 3 PM - 8 PM).
- **Cinema In The Streets**: Jul 25, 2026. Outdoor movie screening on Main Street.
- **Down On Main Street Car Show**: Aug 8, 2026. Classic cars and custom vehicles on Main Street.
- **Clawson Fest**: Aug 22, 2026. Block party with live music, food vendors, Kids' Zone, and artist exhibits.
- **Trick or Treasure**: Late October. Kids trick-or-treat at downtown businesses.
- **The Great Pubkin Crawl**: Late October. Halloween pub crawl through downtown bars and restaurants.
- **Small Business Saturday**: Late November. Special promotions at downtown shops.
- **Downtown Clawson Social District**: Year-round. Purchase a designated drink from a participating bar or restaurant and enjoy it while strolling downtown.
